content:
# NAWA & Welcome to Poland – Welcome Point

URL: https://wtp.agh.edu.pl/category/nawa-welcome-to-poland/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:24:11

NAWA & Welcome to Poland

Welcome to Poland – about the project

In pursuit of the strategy of increasing internationalization at the AGH University and to raise the standard of services provided to foreign academic staff we are proud to announce that a Welcome Point has been created – a place of comprehensive services for the foreign part of the academic community.
Read more..

The Impact of Internationalization on the Openness and Tolerance of the University Environment

The conference was held on 19th April in the Auditorium U-2 of the AGH Univeristy Didactic Centre in Kraków.
Read more..

NAWA programmes for foreigners

Through developing the existing grant and aid programmes, NAWA aims at developing encouraging foreigners to start their studies in Poland at a number of fields to be conducted both in Polish and foreign languages. The available programmes can be found at the links below.
Read more..
